Text: RE Cc Do you know who the associated traders are If not I guess I can ask around I just thought you would know Thanks Coop Robert T Cooper Director Global Wholesale Markets phone fax Email Original Message From Carpino Neil Sent Tuesday November PM To Cooper Robert Cc Clark Danny Stadler Gary Subject RE These are longhaul contracts the associated longhaul trader can help you out Original Message From Cooper Robert Sent Tuesday November PM To Carpino Neil Cc Enochs Fred Clark Danny Edwards Joe Mann Kay Stadler Gary Santikos Mark Surbey Dale Subject Neil In our efforts to sell the Portland MAN the lawyers need copies of all of these contracts to go over assign ability Could you send the contract numbers or just explain the contracts to Danny Clark Danny said he could gather the contracts and get them to me This is needed ASAP as usual Thanks for your help Thanks Coop LIT CAPACITY Counterparty Capacity Deal Status Circuit Term MRC Pacific Carriage STM Unconfirmed HillsboroSJ Dynegy Connect STM Done HillsboroLA Dynegy Connect STM Done HillsboroLA Dynegy Connect STM Done HillsboroLA France Telecom STM Done HillsboroSJ Storage Networks x G Done PtldSea Robert T Cooper Director Global Wholesale Markets phone fax Email
